mapper.sql: com_id, menu_id, parent_id, level, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, menu_type, show_flg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, enableflg

sm.com_id as comId, sm.menu_id as menuId, sm.parent_id as parentId, sm.level as level, sm.name as name, sm.url as url, sm.perms as perms, sm.type as type, sm.icon as icon, sm.order_num as orderNum, sm.menu_type as menuType, sm.show_flg as showFlg, sm.created_by as createdBy, sm.created_time as createdTime, sm.updated_by as updatedBy, sm.updated_time as updatedTime, sm.enableflg as enableflg
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_menu (com_id, , parent_id, level, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, menu_type, show_flg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, enableflg) values (#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, , #{parentId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{showFlg, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enableflg, jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set com_id=#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, , parent_id=#{parentId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, level=#{level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url=#{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms=#{perms, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type=#{type, jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon=#{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num=#{orderNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_type=#{menuType, jdbcType=CHAR}, show_flg=#{showFlg, jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_by=#{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time=#{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by=#{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_time=#{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enableflg=#{enableflg, jdbcType=TINYINT} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
